task.title: Hourly Cleanup
task.description: Cleans out old searches, captcha images, registration questions and expires redirects.

task.title: Daily Cleanup
task.description: Cleans out old sessions and read threads.

task.title: Half-hourly User Cleanup
task.description: Automatically expires bans, warnings and posting suspension and moderation times for users.

task.title: Weekly Backup
task.description: Automatically backups your MyBB tables to your backups directory.

task.title: Promotion System
task.description: Automatically runs the promotion system every 20 minutes.

task.title: Thread Views
task.description: Automatically updates thread views every 15 minutes. This task will automatically be enabled or disabled when changing the 'Delayed Thread Views' setting.

task.title: Tables Check
task.description: Automatically runs a table check and attempts to repair any crashed tables.

task.title: Log Pruning
task.description: Automatically cleans up old MyBB log files (administrator, moderator, task, promotion, and mail logs.)

task.title: Mass Mail
task.description: Automatically sends any queued mass mailings every 15 minutes.

task.title: User Pruning
task.description: Automatically prunes users based on criteria set in the settings every day.

task.title: Delayed Moderation
task.description: Automatically performs delayed moderation actions every 24 hours.

task.title: Version Check
task.description: Automatically checks for news and new versions of MyBB every day.

task.title: Stylesheet Re-Cache
task.description: Re-caches all stylesheets to the filesystem, including minifying the styles.
